Class RPGModeManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.rpg.RPGModeManager
public class RPGModeManager extends Object
Manages all RPG mode functionality including level progression, ability management, speed scaling, and garbage block spawning. Handles RPG-specific game mechanics and coordinates with AbilityManager for ability execution.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phung Yu Jie

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    RPGModeManager()
    Constructs a new RPGModeManager and initializes all RPG subsystems.

  • Constructor Details

    • RPGModeManager

      public RPGModeManager()
      Constructs a new RPGModeManager and initializes all RPG subsystems. Creates AbilityManager, LevelProgressionCalculator, and RPGSpeedScaler instances.

  • Method Details

    • getRpgLevel

      public int getRpgLevel()
      Gets the current RPG level.
      Returns:
      The current level (starts at 1)

    • setRpgLevel

      public void setRpgLevel(int level)
      Sets the RPG level.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to set

    • getAbilityManager

      public AbilityManager getAbilityManager()
      Gets the AbilityManager instance for managing RPG abilities.
      Returns:
      The AbilityManager instance

    • getLevelCalculator

      public LevelProgressionCalculator getLevelCalculator()
      Gets the LevelProgressionCalculator for calculating level progression.
      Returns:
      The LevelProgressionCalculator instance

    • getSpeedScaler

      public RPGSpeedScaler getSpeedScaler()
      Gets the RPGSpeedScaler for calculating game speed based on level.
      Returns:
      The RPGSpeedScaler instance

    • calculateLevelFromLines

      public int calculateLevelFromLines(int totalLinesCleared)
      Calculates the RPG level based on total lines cleared. Uses different line requirements per level tier.
      Parameters:
      totalLinesCleared - The total number of lines cleared since game start
      Returns:
      The calculated RPG level

    • calculateLinesRequiredForLevel

      public int calculateLinesRequiredForLevel(int targetLevel)
      Calculates the total lines required to reach a specific level.
      Parameters:
      targetLevel - The target level to calculate lines for
      Returns:
      The total number of lines needed to reach the target level

    • calculateSpeedForLevel

      public long calculateSpeedForLevel(int level)
      Calculates the game speed (drop interval in milliseconds) based on RPG level. Speed increases (interval decreases) as level increases.
      Parameters:
      level - The current RPG level
      Returns:
      The drop interval in milliseconds for this level

    • spawnGarbageBlocksForLevel

      public int spawnGarbageBlocksForLevel(Board board, int level)
      Spawns garbage brick shapes based on current RPG level to increase difficulty. The number of garbage blocks spawned scales with level progression. Difficulty increases every 5 levels: Levels 1-5: 3 bricks, 6-10: 5 bricks, etc.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board to spawn garbage blocks on
      level - The current RPG level that determines spawn difficulty
      Returns:
      The number of blocks actually spawned

    • findFirstOccupiedColor

      public int findFirstOccupiedColor(int[][] brickData)
      Finds the first occupied color value in the brick data matrix. Used to determine the color of the current piece for ability execution.
      Parameters:
      brickData - The brick shape matrix to search
      Returns:
      The first non-zero color value found, or 0 if none found

    • executeClearBottom3Rows

      public void executeClearBottom3Rows(Board board)
      Executes the Clear Bottom 3 Rows ability. Removes the bottom 3 rows from the board and drops all blocks above down.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board to execute the ability on

    • executeColorBomb

      public int executeColorBomb(Board board)
      Executes the Color Bomb ability. Removes all blocks matching the color of the current piece from the board.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board to execute the ability on
      Returns:
      The number of blocks removed by the ability

    • executeColorSync

      public int executeColorSync(Board board)
      Executes the Color Sync ability. Converts all blocks on the board to match the color of the current piece.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board to execute the ability on
      Returns:
      The number of blocks that were changed

    • getSlowTimeDurationSeconds

      public static int getSlowTimeDurationSeconds()
      Gets the duration of the Slow Time ability in seconds.
      Returns:
      The slow time duration in seconds
